# The `LibCallSimplifier` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/libcallsimplifier">LibCallSimplifier</a> - This class implements a collection of optimizations that replace well formed calls to library functions with a more optimal form. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LibCallSimplifier</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/libcallsimplifier">LibCallSimplifier</a> - This class implements a collection of optimizations that replace well formed calls to library functions with a more optimal form.

For example, replacing &#39;printf(&quot;Hello!&quot;)&#39; with &#39;puts(&quot;Hello!&quot;)&#39;.

Definition at line 103 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h">SimplifyLibCalls.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### optimizeCall() {#a73c4a774eb638f963533b77f7124293b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; LibCallSimplifier::optimizeCall (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42; CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp; B)</>}>
optimizeCall - Take the given call instruction and return a more optimal value to replace the instruction with or 0 if a more optimal form can&#39;t be found.

Note that the returned value may be equal to the instruction being optimized. In this case all other instructions that use the given instruction were modified and the given instruction is dead. The call must not be an indirect call.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h/#l00158">158</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-h">SimplifyLibCalls.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-cpp/#l04077">4077</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/simplifylibcalls-cpp">SimplifyLibCalls.cpp</a>.
